subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Bernardini’s margin of victory at the Grade I Jockey Club Gold Cup, over a compact field of three others at Belmont Park, could barely register how dominant the horse really was.
snippet: Bernardini’s margin of victory at the Grade I Jockey Club Gold Cup, over a compact field of three others at Belmont Park, could barely register how dominant the horse really was.
